column1: Badvel is a town in YSR Kadapa district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in Badvel mandal of Rajampet revenue division..Badvel is just 57 kilometres (35 mi) away from Proddatur and 59 kilometres (37 mi) away from Kadapa.
Badvel is an assembly constituency in Andhra Pradesh. Currently it is reserved for SC's.
The primary and secondary school education is imparted by government
column3: under the School Education Department of the state. The medium of instruction followed by different schools are English
